Uses of Interface
org.codehaus.preon.el.Descriptive

Packages that use Descriptive
org.codehaus.preon The package providing the API allowing you to construct your own Codecs, and to extend the way Codecs are constructed. 
org.codehaus.preon.codec The package providing some default CodecFactories, supporting a number of different Codecs. 
org.codehaus.preon.el The package providing classes to bridge between Limbo and Preon. 
org.codehaus.preon.el.ast Internal expression representations. 
org.codehaus.preon.el.ctx The package providing some implementations of the Context and Reference interfaces. 
org.codehaus.preon.util The package providing some utility classes, supporting the construction of Codecs.

Subinterfaces of Descriptive in org.codehaus.preon.el
 interface Expression<R,C>
          An object encapsulating an expression, with the ability to evaluate itself against an external context, and the ability to describe itself against a certain external context.

          A ResolverContext that also provides access to all bindings defined for a certain type.
 interface Reference<E>
          A reference to an Object, based on an environment of type E.
 interface ReferenceContext<E>
          A context for building references to elements in an environment of E.
